protein.specific_function: Dimethylates a single guanine residue at position 26 of most tRNAs using S-adenosyl-L-methionine as donor of the methyl groups.

reference.reference_text: Liu J, Straby KB: The human tRNA(m(2)(2)G(26))dimethyltransferase: functional expression and characterization of a cloned hTRM1 gene. Nucleic Acids Res. 2000 Sep 15;28(18):3445-51.
